title: Maren Morris announces first pregnancy as she and husband Ryan Hurd prepare for a baby boy
text:
Maren Morris has mastered the art of marriage less than a year after tying the knot with Ryan Hurd, and now she's ready to take on parenthood.

The couple has announced that they're expecting their first child together, a baby boy.

The The Middle singer took to Instagram Tuesday with a gorgeous maternity photo to announce the big news.

The 29-year-old wrote in the caption: 'The irony is just too rich that after a year of living in the “GIRL” headspace, the universe would give us a baby boy to even things out. See you in 2020, little one.'

She was referencing her sophomore album Girl, which dropped this March, and which she's currently touring with until next month.

The photo showed her wrapped in dusty rose sheer fabric as she cradled her exposed baby bump, with Hurd, 32, sitting next to her against a matching backdrop.

Morris recently revealed her bump in a green and blue sequined mini dress at her concert in Nashville last Friday.

The daddy-to-be also shared the news on his Instagram, with a reference to Seinfeld: 'MY BOYS CAN SWIM. BABY BOY HURD 2020!

'Look at her...cannot believe this life with this girl. Also, thank you George Constanza for this caption that I’ve been sitting on my entire life...'

He posted another photo from the shoot, this one in black-and-white, showing them standing and looking into each other's eyes.

Love songs: Morris and Hurd met in 2013 when they co-wrote Tim McGraw's Last Turn Home, and they began dating in 2015

Nashville nuptials: They subsequently got engaged in 2017, before they tied the knot last March in a Nashville ceremony

Morris showed off her belly in a cropped denim jacket and some dark high-waisted underwear.

She and Hurd met in 2013 when they co-wrote Tim McGraw's Last Turn Home, and they began dating in 2015.

They subsequently got engaged in 2017, before they tied the knot last March in a Nashville ceremony.
